title: How many REAL peopel are there in Riot support team?
body: Just curious is all cuz I always get the same copy pasta responses and it's making me wonder just how many robots work for support.

replies.body:
I would like to point out that Riot doesn't have as much man power compared to the player population. There millions of players playing League every day with at least 5% submitting support tickets. Regardless of how much staff Riot has I believe it would be impossible for them to personally respond to every support ticket submitted. If your support ticket is a simple task that can be answered using a automated response then that will have to suffice. But if it's a more complicated matter. Then unless the ticked says resolved or whatever system Riot uses to close it's tickets. Please be patient. Even if a automated response is given. A ticket case is not solved into said otherwise by the ticket case status. 

Regards,
Fog

The issue I have seen with automated responses is they just scan for key words and then give the generic response for those few key words I have seen people send in tickets like "My account was banned " etc yet due to the way they worded it the response was something about the in game store or something ridiculous like that.
That's basically how an automated response works.
